dct_title_s: A map of the country which was the scene of operations of the Northern Army : including the wilderness through which General Arnold marched to attack Quebec
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. In upper margin: Plate VI. Engraved for the Life of Washington. From : Atlas to accompany John Marshall's The life of George Washington. Philadelphia, 1804-07. (plate VI). Historic Maps copy imperfect: lower edge trimmed, with loss of imprint.
